1: <pb/><t>Aju tzaq'web'l te yol tuk'il k'ujlalil, b'i'x in we' q'oj tu'n, atzunju tzaq'web'l tuk'il ilb'il, mas in tzaj q'oj tu'n.</t>
2: <pb/><t>Nim yol te q'ob'l nab'l in che yolin qe xjal at kynab'l ti'j, atzun qe xjal minti' kynab'l o'kx in che yolin ti'j yol minti' tajb'en.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Tuj tkyaqil lugar at Qman Dios, ex in q'on kwent kyi'j qe xjal b'a'n ex kyi'j qe mya b'a'n.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Aju yol at tchya'l in tzaj tq'o'n qchwinqlal, atzunju yol puro ploj in qo k'ixb'i tu'n.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Aju xjal minti' tnab'l minti' in kub' tuj twitz ok tok mayo'n tu'n tman; atzunju xjal niman tman tu'n in tzaj tyek'un qa at tnab'l.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Nim ti'xti at tuj tja ju xjal tz'aqlxix, atzunju xjal mya b'a'n minti' in xi tnik'b'en aju in tkamb'a'n.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Qe xjal at kynab'l in kyq'o'n ojtzqib'l kye mastl, atzun qe xjal minti' kynab'l minti' in kyb'incha'n ikju.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Aju oyaj in kyq'o'n qe xjal mya b'a'n, minti' in xi tk'mo'n Qman, atzunju kyna'j Dios qe xjal tz'aqlxix, in xi tk'mo'n Qman tuk'il tzalajb'il.</t>
9: <pb/><t>Ik'un tu'n Qman aju kyb'inchb'en qe xjal mya b'a'n, atzunju xjal in b'et tuj tumel k'ujla'n tu'n Qman.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Aju xjal in kyaj tkolin ju b'e b'a'n, b'a'n tu'n t-xi kawit kyuw; atzunju nne'l tik'un kawb'il te, kymel.</t>
11: <pb/><t>Twitz Qman tkub'sa'n ju kamik tuk'ix ju kynajb'il kyimni, ax ikx tkub'sa'n twitz aju kyximb'etz xjal.</t>
12: <pb/><t>Aju xjal jawni twitz minti' in tk'ujla'n aju nno'k mayonte te ti'j mya b'a'n, ex minti' nno'k tmojb'an tib' kyuk'il qeju at kynab'l.</t>
13: <pb/><t>Aju xjal in tzalaj tanmi, ax ikx in tzalaj twitz, ex aju xjal b'is ta', b'i'x in tzaj ta'w tuj tanmi.</t>
14: <pb/><t>Aju xjal at tnab'l in jyon ti'j ojtzqib'l, atzunju xjal minti' tnab'l o'kx tok tk'u'j ti'j ju minti' tajb'en.</t>
15: <pb/><t>Kykyaqil q'ij mya b'a'n in che ela teju xjal in b'isun, atzunju xjal in tzalaj, kykyaqil q'ij in che ok puro b'a'n te te.</t>
16: <pb/><t>Mas b'a'n tu'n qniman te Qman Dios maske meb'a xjal qo', twitzju tu'n qok q'inun ex tuj b'is in qo anq'in.</t>
17: <pb/><t>Mas b'a'n qa at qk'ujlalil maske noq itzaj qchi', twitzju chib'j qchi' ex at ik'b'il qxol.</t>
18: <pb/><t>Aju xjal jurat in jaw q'ojl, noq q'oj in jyo'n ti'j; atzunju xjal minti' in tzaj naj tq'oj, in kub' yupj q'oj tu'n.</t>
19: <pb/><t>Tuj twitz ju xjal ky'aj mer ik tza'n ch'i'x tkub' tuj tb'e; atzunju xjal tz'aqlxix, aju tb'e puro qtz'umin tuj.</t>
20: <pb/><t>Aju k'wa'lb'aj at tnab'l, jun tzalajb'il jlu te tman; atzunju k'wa'lb'aj minti' tnab'l, jun b'is jlu te ttxu'.</t>
21: <pb/><t>Aju xjal minti' tnab'l in tzalaj tu'nju minti' tnab'l; atzunju xjal at tnab'l tuj tumel in b'et tuj tb'e.</t>
22: <pb/><t>Minti' in japun aju in kub' kyximan xjal qa mi a'l jun q'ol kyconsej; ex qa at nim q'ol consej b'a'n nne'la jlu.</t>
23: <pb/><t>At tzalajb'il teju xjal in tzaq'wet ju yol tu'n, ex mas at tzalajb'il te qa ma tzaq'wet tu'n ok tajb'en.</t>
24: <pb/><t>Aju b'e tb'eyil chwinqlal kyja' in xi' jawni, ex in klet ju xjal at tnab'l tu'n tu'n mi'n tku'x tuj kynajb'il kyimni.</t>
25: <pb/><t>In kub' t-xitun Qman tja ju xjal in jaw tniman tib', ex in tkyuwsa'n aju tetzb'il meb'a xu'j.</t>
26: <pb/><t>Ik'un tu'n Qman aju kyximb'etz qe xjal b'inchal mya b'a'n, atzun qe yol minti' kypaltil in tzalaj kyi'j.</t>
27: <pb/><t>Aju xjal in pon tk'u'j ti'j nimku, tu'nx in che naj qeju ate' tuj tja; atzunju xjal minti' in tk'mo'n pwaq tu'n mi'n tkub' kysentens xjal tu'n, ok k'anq'il.</t>
28: <pb/><t>Aju xjal tz'aqlxix, nej in kub' ten ximal ti'j alkye yol tu'n t-xi' ttzaq'we'n, atzunju xjal b'inchal mya b'a'n, noq nne'tz chitj yol mya b'a'n tuj ttzi'.</t>
29: <pb/><t>Nne'l tpa'n tib' Qman kyi'j xjal b'inchal mya b'a'n, atzun qe xjal tz'aqlxix in tzaj tb'i'n kyna'j Dios.</t>
30: <pb/><t>Aju xjal in qo tzaj tke'yin tuk'il tzalajb'il in qo tzalaj tu'n; ex aju tqanil b'a'n in tq'o'n ak'aj qipumal.</t>
31: <pb/><t>Aju xjal in xi tniman aju kawb'il tuj tumelxix ktel kyxol qe xjal at kynab'l.</t>
32: <pb/><t>Aju xjal minti' in xi tniman kawb'il te, tu'nx tib' nne'l tik'un tib'; atzunju xjal in xi tniman kawb'il te, nno'k mastl tnab'l.</t>
33: <pb/><t>Qa in qo xob' twitz Dios, tu'n jlu in tzaj q'o'n xnaq'tzb'il qe tu'n tten qnab'l; qa qajb'il tu'n qk'monte nimb'il qe, tnejel il ti'j tu'n tkub' qmansin qib'.</t>
